byline.original: By KATHERINE SCHULTEN and SARAH GROSS

abstract: The broad concept of “drawing to learn” is gaining respect and popularity from classrooms to boardrooms. Here are some ways to try it out with Times content.

headline.main: Skills and Strategies | Doodling, Sketching and ‘Mind Mapping’ as Learning Tools

snippet: The broad concept of “drawing to learn” is gaining respect and popularity from classrooms to boardrooms. Here are some ways to try it out with Times content.
